name: cssauron-glsl
description: cssauron language for glsl asts from glsl-parser
readme:
# cssauron-glsl

[CSSauron](https://github.com/chrisdickinson/cssauron) preconfigured for [GLSL AST nodes](https://github.com/chrisdickinson/glsl-parser).

# implements

* tag queries
* `>`, `~`, `+`, and ` ` connectors
* pseudoclasses
* attribute selectors

# license

MIT
